    • addEdge

      public void addEdge(ResidualVertex origin, ResidualVertex dest, double capacity) throws Exception
      Method to add a residual edge between given origin and destination vertices with a specified capacity.
      Parameters:
      origin - The ResidualVertex representing the origin of the edge.
      dest - The ResidualVertex representing the destination of the edge.
      capacity - The capacity of the residual edge.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs during the addition of the residual edge.
